title: Sam Cooke
summary: Samuel Cook[4] (January 22, 1931 – December 11, 1964),[4] known professionally as Sam Cooke, was an American singer, songwriter, and entrepreneur. Considered to be a pioneer and one of the most influential soul artists of all time, Cooke is commonly referred to as the "King of Soul" for his distinctive vocals, notable contributions to the genre and high significance in popular music.[5]
